title: No Friendly Error Message Shown When Data is Missing for Series
description: When there is no data for a series, the software should display a friendly error message to inform the user.
OB: Currently, when there is no data for a series, no error message or notification is displayed to the user.
EB: When there is no data for a series, the software should pop up a friendly error message to remind the user of the missing data.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a chart.
2. Set the data definition for the chart.
3. Select a column that does not have any data assigned to it.
